caption:
This is a photograph showing a group of young people at a beach. In the foreground, two women are walking through shallow water. The woman on the left is wearing a black bikini and sunglasses hanging from her swimsuit, while the one on the right is dressed in a white tank top and cutoff denim shorts. The expressions and body language suggest leisurely movement and casual interaction.

In the background, other individuals enhance the lively beach scene. A person is wading in the water with splashes around, and another is floating on the water, further away. To the left, another woman wearing a wet, partly see-through shirt appears to be adjusting her hair, standing out of the water.
  
The ambient light, water shimmer, and the casual attire of the people give off a vibrant, summery vibe typical of a busy beach scene. The overall composition captures a moment of youthful enjoyment and relaxation in a natural setting.
title: On the beach at Rocky Point near Hawk Cove, east of Baltimore
